text: This location is super convenient and always clean. All of the staff are friendly and remember me when I come in which gives it that 'mom and pop' feel. The pizza is always amazing and tastes as if it was made with love. This is my go to pizza place.

text: I've been going here for at least five years now. The owners at this location in Garland by my home are so nice. I rarely see the wife but they are both so nice. The place is always spotless and the workers are curteous. I'm sad I'm moving from the area soon.
